typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{Unit Price} as decimal(10,0),
		{Unit Cost} as decimal(10,0),
		{Total Revenue} as decimal(10,0),
		{Total Cost} as decimal(10,0),
		{Total Profit} as decimal(10,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> salesdatacuration
salesdatacuration sort(desc(Country, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Curatedfile'],
	dateFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd',
	mapColumn(
		{Region Name} = Region,
		{Country Name} = Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Order Priority},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Date},
		Region,
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Per Unit Price} = {Unit Price},
		{Per Unit Cost} = {Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit}
	)) ~> curateddata
